name: A Leaf's Journey
description:
A Leaf's Journey is an exploration side-scroller where you play as a flying leaf.

It has been developed over the month of October 2020 for the Practice Circle Game #4.

It is still in development so expect some rough corners.

Team:
Azertinv
    programmer and game designer
Omniboss
    @TheRealJakeRose, composer and sound designer
Evil Pacman
    https://www.artstation.com/rowanrees, 2D artist
Wandering Artist
    https://wanderingartist.bandcamp.com/, composer
